Disclaimers for SWSAM Solutions All the information on this website - http://swsam.co.uk - is published in good faith and for general information purpose only. SWSAM Solutions does not make any warranties about the completeness, reliability and accuracy of this information. Any action you take upon the information you find on this website (SWSAM Solutions), is strictly at your own risk. SWSAM Solutions will not be liable for any losses and/or damages in connection with the use of our website. From our website, you can visit other websites by following hyperlinks to such external sites. While we strive to provide only quality links to useful and ethical websites, we have no control over the content and nature of these sites. These links to other websites do not imply a recommendation for all the content found on these sites. Site owners and content may change without notice and may occur before we have the opportunity to remove a link which may have gone 'bad'. Please be also aware that when you leave our website, other sites may have different privacy policies and which are beyond our control. Please be sure to check the Privacy Policies of these sites as well as their " " before engaging in any business or uploading any information. By using our website, you hereby consent to our disclaimer and agree to its . Should we update, amend or make any changes to this document, those changes will be prominently posted here.

Turn Speech into Searchable, Actionable Text Transcribe, identify, and search—all offline Aurico transforms audio and video into searchable transcripts with face tagging—completely offline for total control. 40+ Organizations Using Aurico Spanning banking, healthcare, education, and telecom Searchable, secure, and tagged by speaker Aurico helps us transcribe and tag interviews securely and fast. It's become a must-have for our media team. Aurico is an AI-based transcription solution that converts spoken content into precise, editable text, regardless of whether it's in an online or offline environment. It goes beyond traditional speech-to-text by also identifying people in video and enabling fast keyword-based search. From compliance tracking to content indexing, Aurico brings speed, clarity, and structure to your voice and video data. Keyword Search & Filtering Stay up-to-date with innovations that matter. Here's how AI is transforming industries we serve: AI is optimising diagnostic accuracy and automating repetitive tasks. Stay informed with our insights on AI advancements, industry trends, and success stories.​ Stay informed with our insights on AI advancements, industry trends, and success stories.​ AI-driven verification is cutting onboarding time in half. Stay informed with our insights on AI advancements, industry trends, and success stories.​ Stay informed with our insights on AI advancements, industry trends, and success stories.​ Edge AI is enabling real-time monitoring in public spaces. Stay informed with our insights on AI advancements, industry trends, and success stories.​ Stay informed with our insights on AI advancements, industry trends, and success stories.​ Computer vision and NLP are enhancing content access and automation. Stay informed with our insights on AI advancements, industry trends, and success stories.​ Stay informed with our insights on AI advancements, industry trends, and success stories.​ As a leading digital services provider, we are experts in delivering innovative solutions, from software development to AI-driven platforms. Aurico brings structure to spoken content—turning conversations, broadcasts, and meetings into searchable, high-accuracy transcripts with face and voice tagging. Whether used for compliance, reporting, or content indexing, Aurico works completely offline for total data control. Works without an internet connection Ideal for private, secure, or air-gapped environments Keeps sensitive conversations and records in-house Distinguishes between speakers in multi-person recordings Tags known faces in video content Enables audio-visual tracking for audit or analysis Transcribes in minutes with high precision Supports audio and video file uploads Denoises poor-quality recordings for better results Filter transcripts by specific or topics Find key moments fast using built-in keyword search Great for case reviews, training, or compliance audits . Download transcripts in DOCX or PDF format Integrate via API into your existing systems Supports both individual and batch uploads Aurico supports flexible integrations. Run on local servers or workstations for fully offline transcription. Hook into your existing apps to automate speech-to-text and video tagging. Upload one file at a time or process content in bulk—Aurico handles both. Let's collaborate to bring AI into your workflows—securely, efficiently, and at scale. Why Hyper-i? Features Hyper-i supports both modes, active and passive liveness detection. However, we recommend using our unique passive liveness detection which comes with multiple security checks. Edge Detection Texture Detection Distance detection Skin tone mapping Advantages Enhance security and audit trails Ease of integration within processes Various deployment models Support for users with special needs Microservices based architecture Cloud ready-high availability and scalable Password less experience Schedule a demo Secure, swift, and smart identity verification at your fingertips. Book a call today How Hyper-i Works Simple integration Experience the seamless integration of advanced technology and user-friendly design with Hyper-i, ensuring a secure and efficient identity verification process every time. 1. Scan your ID Snap a picture of your government-issued ID or authenticate via the National database, with OCR technology. 2. Face/Fingerprint capture The Hyper-i app shows a step-by-step process for accurate capture of face or fingerprint images. 3. Security checks Hyper-i conducts liveness and fraud checks ensuring user authenticity and system security. 4. Authenticate Quick display or return of verification results, providing instant feedback and system efficiency. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. Sensitive information is hashed to protect user privacy. Diverse Applications for Modern Needs Use cases Hyper-i is versatile and adaptable, fitting into a variety of use cases Digital onboarding Transform your customer onboarding experience into a seamless, digital-first journey. Remote KYC (know your customer) Conduct Know Your Customer (KYC) checks remotely with confidence and ease. Sign on/dual factor authentication Reinforce your security protocols with robust, biometric-based authentication. Efficient attendance systems Modernize your attendance system with quick, highly accurate face/fingerprint recognition technology. Advanced POI detection/security Enhance your security systems effectively with real-time Person of Interest detection. Priority customer recognition Elevate customer service by recognizing and prioritizing key customers instantly. Propel your business to new heights Discover the impact of tailored solutions on your operations. Book a call today Why Hyper-i?
